Hey!.title: Hey!
Hey!.content:
ShanksMakesStuff.xyz   
I’m Shashank Rao, welcome to my digital garden!
About me
I’m a genetics student at King’s College London, passionate about biology, programming, and bits of social contract theory. I play the guitar and write stories in my free time - I hope you enjoy my projects and musings!
Projects


GWASExplorer.com 

Visualise GWAS Summary Statistics
No Code
Flexible Formatting Requirements
Automated Allele Frequency Querying with GNOMAD
GeneCards Integrated
No Data Sent to Servers | Everything is in your browser
Please Note: this is NOT the GWAS Explorer application hosted by the NCI



Think Pythonically : Learn Python the Better Way

Don’t just learn python. Understand it. Think Pythonically is a free online course that focusses on teaching you how to think in a python-compatible way, instead of just memorizing syntax. This is how I would learn Python if I were to start over! :)



Ideate2D  : Make Games with Python

Ideate2D is a WYSIWYG 2D game engine written in Python, on PyGame. It is designed to make game-making accessible, while still retaining all of PyGame’s flexibility!



Into the Mind : Free Read

A work in progress book that combines biology, social contract theory, history, and many other areas to comprehensively rationalize modern society and how it has come into being.
